testcase.name: User log in with customer credantials
First Name,Last Name,Middle Name, Email.... section should be visible.
There should be view option and edit button there.
testcase.system-out: Given User can see view option..............................................passed And User can see edit button there.........................................passed

testcase.name: User can reach edit option from view option
testcase.system-out: Given User can click and see view option...................................passed And User can click and see edit option......................................passed

testcase.name: Edit button allow user update user info
testcase.system-out: Given Click edit button.....................................................passed And Delete first name and enter First_Name..................................passed And Delete last name and enter Last_Name...................................passed And Delete email and enter e_mail...........................................passed And Delete phone number and enter Phone_Number..............................passed And Delete zip code and enter Zip_Code......................................passed And Delete City and enter City..............................................passed And Delete SSn and enter S_s_n..............................................passed

testcase.name: User can delete customer and see message regarding delete.
testcase.system-out: Given User can see delete button............................................passed And User can click delete button............................................passed And User Can see warning message...........................................passed Then User confirm delete and delete info....................................passed
